htmlform.formDescription: Entry form for patients enrolled for ANC services

obs.answerLabels: 1st ANC visit, 2nd ANC visit, 3rd ANC visit, 4th ANC visit, 5th ANC visit,6th ANC visit, 7th ANC visit, 8th ANC visit, 9th ANC visit, 10th ANC visit
N - Normal, MAM - Moderate Acute Malnutrition, SAM - Severe Acute Malnutrition, SAMO - Severe Acute Malnutrition with Oedema, O - Overweight/Obese

C - Counseled but declined HIV testing, T - Counseled and tested but didn't receive results, TR - Counseled tested and results given - Client tested HIV Negative, TRR - Counseled tested and results given - Client tested HIV Positive, TR√ - ANC revisit clients with a known HIV Negative status, TRR√ - ANC revisit clients with a known HIV Positive status, TRK; - Clients with documented HIV Negative status, TRRK; - Clients with documented HIV Positive status, TR+ - Client tested HIV Negative on a re-test, TRR+ - Client tested HIV Positive on a re-test

C - Counseled but declined HIV testing, T - Counseled and tested but didn't receive results, TR - Counseled tested and results given - Client tested HIV Negative, TRR - Counseled tested and results given - Client tested HIV Positive, TR√ - ANC revisit clients with a known HIV Negative status, TRR√ - ANC revisit clients with a known HIV Positive status, TRK - Clients with documented HIV Negative status, TRRK - Clients with documented HIV Positive status, TR+ - Client tested HIV Negative on a re-test, TRR+ - Client tested HIV Positive on a re-test
ART - Initiated ART for eMTCT on visit,ARTK - Client already on HAART before this pregnancy,ART√ - Client is revist and was prescribed on earlier visit,NA - Not Applicable

1 - No signs,2 - Presumptive TB , 3C - TB Diagnosed - Clinically diagnosed, 3G - TB Diagnosed - Gene Xpert, 3L - TB Diagnosed - TB LAM, 3M - TB Diagnosed -TB Microscopy, 3X - TB Diagnosed - Chest Xray, 3O - TB Diagnosed - Others, 4 - Currenty on TB Treatment, 5 - Completed TB Treatment
A - Postive, A - Negative, B - Postive, B - Negative, O Postive, O - Negative, AB - Postive, AB - Negative

Rx - Client tested positive results given and treatment initiated, +Ve - Client tested positive results given but treatment not yet initiated, NR - Client tested negative and results given, NT - Client not Tested for Syphilis

Rx - Client tested positive results given and treatment initiated, +Ve - Client tested positive results given but treatment not yet initiated, NR - Client tested negative and results given, NT - Client not Tested for Syphilis

Rx - Client tested positive results given and treatment initiated, +Ve - Client tested positive results given but treatment not yet initiated, NR - Client tested negative and results given, NT - Client not Tested for Hep B

Rx - Client tested positive results given and treatment initiated, +Ve - Client tested positive results given but treatment not yet initiated, NR - Client tested negative and results given, RX√ - Revisit - Client tested positive and results given, +Ve√ - Revisit - Client tested positive but not yet given treatment, NR√ - Revisit - Client tested negative results given, RX+ - Retest - Client tested positive and results given, +Ve+ - Retest -Client tested positive but not yet given treatment, NR+ - Retest - Client tested negative and results given, NT - Client not Tested for Hep B
C - Counselling Done, C/D - Counselling and Provided with Condoms
PHY - Physical Violence,SX - Sexual Violence, PSY - Psychological Violence, NIL - No History Signs and Symptoms of GBV
